body:
Hello everyone!!!!  

Today I tried to find a new free account from a website. Then I couldn't as usual. But when I tried to login my own MC account back, it didn't accept my username and password. I tried to change my password, but it didn't effect. Now I cannot login to my account. I emailed to Mojang, but I need to acces my account asap. Please tell me what do to! I really need help!!!!!!!

title: REALLY NEED HELP!!- Stolen account- Borra_

replies.body: Try to log in with your email instead of your username(?)
replies.body_tagged: Try to log in with your email instead of your username(?)

replies.body: I tried but nothing changed. Anyway I got it back, Thank you all for helping!
replies.body_tagged: I tried but nothing changed. Anyway I got it back, Thank you all for helping!

Congrats on getting back into your account. Seeing as the problem is fixed, I am going to lock this thread now.
